Moving on up penthouse suite upgrade
our room was beautiful we had beautiful complimentary products etc
Thankyou whoever did that In terms of the rooms themselves they had some nice features but to be honest they were just OK
The Mondrian looks good with quirky fixtures and fittings and is in a good location
The room was ready once I arrived and the valet bell boys and front desk were very helpful and friendly
Enjoyed unique room design especially the mirrors
Lovely staff but hotel needs a face lift Rooms need to be updated
1: Tv is built into the mirror
We booked a corner king suite for 4 people
Due to a late change of rooms we had some champagne and treats delivered to our room for another couples anniversary
We were after a quintesentialy LA styled hotel room and this definitely ticked that box
The bathroom had a large shower as well as a bath
Not worth the money go elsewhere for a reasonable price and clean room
We had a view of the blvd which was ok

Big room nice view good locations Nice receptionists The room service was n’t good bed should be replaced lights in bathroom was n’t working properly hair on floors and coffee tablets was n’t refilled the wardrobes should be bigger
They are already out of the king bed for our particular room type
2: Rooms were clean but a bit dated
Hotel was great but the room had a leak in the ceiling on the bathroom
The rooms themselves feel like a cheap renovation of a 80s hotel room
Every time you are in that bathroom you will wake them up with the light
I would not rate this more than 2 3 star hotel base on my room and service
I have had MANY nights on this hotel and have at times had 2 4 rooms at the time so I have been a good customer but I will not visit this hotel again
The TV was on one side of a large “ mirror ” that swivelled on a pole
I paid a pretty high rate for this hotel and expected a decent quality room
In place of the king suite which had 2 separate rooms we were given a queen suite
3: The Mondrian is definitely tired and was under construction the entire time think banging in the room next door at 8 am
They felt like rockstars and could not stop talking about the great room
I checked in at 1 PM and my king bed studio suite was not ready so I accepted a two double room instead2
Then asked if we used anything else in the mini bar as if they had no idea how the charges were put on our room bill
It should be included in the room charge
The next two days were generally fine although it was annoying that a TV show was being filmed one of the days and also that unlike my previous stays the drinks at the pool bar were terrible
The snacks in the room where old and not fresh the was loud beeping noises coming from the hallway
The host would not allow us to get a window seat as they were all reserved even though it was early enough before the breakfast rush and there were 5 window seats available
In our view it ’s has lost its magic completely
